name: robotlab-x
description: A cross platform desktop application for creating and running robots

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd server && yarn electron-dev"
scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist build client/dist client/build server/dist
scripts.clean-modules: shx rm -rf client/node_modules && shx rm -rf server/node_modules && shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.start-server-dev: cd server && yarn install && yarn electron-dev
scripts.install-client: shx mkdir -p server/dist/ && shx rm -rf server/dist/client && shx mv client/build server/dist/client
scripts.package-win: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn package-win
scripts.package-linux: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn package-linux
scripts.package-raspi: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn package-raspi
scripts.package-mac: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn package-mac
scripts.test: cd client && yarn test-no-watch && cd ../server && yarn test
scripts.test-coverage: cd client && yarn test-coverage && cd ../server && yarn test-coverage

author: GroG
